about.title: About
about.conferenceDescription: INTERNATIONAL CONFERENCE ON MERGERS AND ACQUISITIONS (M&A) IN THE HEALTHCARE SECTOR 2025 - HIMA 2025 (Held for the first time) organized by Medicallaw, will bring together more than 200 leaders from ministries, healthcare corporations, investment funds, biomedical technology and genetic testing, as well as enterprises in cosmetics, nutrition, dairy, and international experts. The event aims to promote legal transparency and standardize M&A processes in the healthcare sector, with a vision toward IPO readiness and sustainable growth.

agenda.title: Conference Agenda
agenda.description: Explore in-depth discussion sessions and networking opportunities.

items.title: Opening Remarks
items.note: Delivered by the Leadership of the Ministry of Health

items.title: Session 1: Vietnam Healthcare M&A – Legal Landscape and Investment Outlook
items.note: Speaker: Assoc. Prof. Dang Duc Nhu, MD, PhD with extensive experience at the Department of Medical Services Administration, Ministry of Health

items.title: Session 2: Doing M&A Right – Global Best Practices
items.note: Speaker: Mr. Brian Langenberg (Representative of ONEtoONE). ONEtoONE is an international middle-market M&A advisory firm, with a presence in more than 30 countries and offices in over 70 cities worldwide. The firm has successfully completed more than 2,000 deals to date

items.title: Session 3: Buyer Expectations – What the International Investor Expects
items.note: Speaker: Representative from an International Investment Fund

items.title: Session 4: Vietnam’s Public Capital Market – A Public Path to Raising Capital
items.note: Speakers: Representatives from an Asset Management Fund or a Securities Firm

items.title: Panel Discussion & Q&A: M&A in Vietnam’s Healthcare Sector
items.note: Representatives from ONEtoONE, Medicallaw, Securities Firm, International Investment Fund, and Healthcare Enterprises
